sentence.Network_en: This afternoon the Palestinians held an impromptu press conference.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天下午巴勒斯坦方面临时召开了记者招待会。

sentence.Network_en: The announcement was made in an impromptu press conference at the airport.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一宣布是在机场举行的临时新闻发布会上作出的.

sentence.Network_en: I'm sure his remarks were rehearsed, not impromptu.
sentence.Network_cn: 我肯定他的话是预先想好的, 不是即席讲的.

list.abs: “即”字的... ... 即夕[ at that night] 即席发言[ extemporize;speak impromptu;make an extemporaneous speech] 即行[ expedite].
3．即席演讲（Impromptu speech）: 题目将在现场抽签后宣布。主办单位：中国日报社 China Daily 联想集团  Lenovo承办单位：21世 …
即兴演讲（impromptu speech），顾名思义，就是指临场的、毫无准备的演讲。在前面所提到的两大比赛中，即兴演讲所占时间为1~…

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (as an adverb): from French, from Latin in promptu 'in readiness', from promptus (see prompt)

encyclopedia.content: 即兴曲是19世纪的一种抒情特性曲。即兴是指创作动因的偶发性而言，类似中国古典诗歌中的“偶成”。《幻想即兴曲》是这一体裁的典范作品。所谓即兴创作，就是不预先把谱子写出来，而是在乐器上一面创作一面演奏。

entry.def: An impromptu action is one that you do without planning or organizing it in advance.

example.ex: This afternoon the Palestinians held an impromptu press conference...
example.tran: 今天下午巴勒斯坦方面临时召开了记者招待会。

example.ex: The children put on an impromptu concert for the visitors.
example.tran: 孩子们为来访者即兴献上了一场音乐会。

sentences.sentence: "a witty impromptu must not sound premeditated"

means.word_mean: 2. a short musical passage that seems to have been made spontaneously without advance preparation
1. with little or no preparation or forethought;

means.word_mean: 事先无准备(的), 临时(的)

sentences.en: The announcement was made in an impromptu press conference at the airport.
sentences.cn: 这一宣布是在机场举行的临时新闻发布会上作出的。

sentences.en: I’m sure his remarks were rehearsed, not impromptu.
sentences.cn: 我肯定他的话是预先想好的, 不是即席讲的。

sentences.en: I quite by chance got drawn into a kind of impromptu party downstairs.
sentences.cn: 我碰巧被拉去参加楼下那种临时组织起来的舞会。
